item.title: Looking for a designer to help with future features!
item.description: With the big v0.1.0 release behind us now is the time to start working on brand new features, but the project needs a designer to help! Scheduled streams are on the roadmap and will require fresh UI to be designed around all the new functionality that the feature will bring. If you’re a designer who thinks Owncast is pretty cool, and you’re interested in spending some time with the project, this is a great opportunity.
